root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 5-c-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 5. Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls5.c Adopt well-designed policies and enforceable legislation to promote gender equality and the empowerment of all women and girls at all levels and strengthen existing ones5.c.1. Proportion of countries with systems to track and report on the amount of resources allocated to gender equality and women's empowermentThis involves affirming or denying the existence of systems to monitor and make public the amount of resources allocated to gender equality and the empowerment of women.Not available
